title: Suspect in Taiwanese church shooting indicted on federal hate crime charges
description: The alleged gunman in a Taiwanese church shooting in California that killed one and injured five others, now faces nearly 100 federal charges, including hate crimes.

title: Ex-head of DHS disinformation governance board sues Fox News for defamation
description: The former head of the Department of Homeland Security's disinformation board is suing Fox News for defamation, in the same court where Fox just settled with Dominion.

title: WATCH:  The story behind viral video of kid's emotional reaction to family’s new home
description: You may have seen this video of Evin having the sweetest reaction when being surprised with a new home. It shows how they gratifying it was for the family to no longer be without a home.

title: Minnesota man convicted of murder for beheading girlfriend
description: A Minnesota man has been convicted of first-degree murder for beheading his girlfriend in front of several witnesses

title: Man arrested in crime spree involving armed carjacking, robbery, hoax 911 call
description: A former Army chaplain was arrested in connection with a California crime spree that involved an armed carjacking, hoax 911 call and bank robbery, authorities said.

title: Mexico arrests 2 more in March kidnap, killing of Americans
description: Prosecutors in Mexico say they have arrested two more men in the March 3 kidnapping of four Americans and the killing of two of them

title: Elon Musk says he has chosen new Twitter CEO, will step down within weeks
description: Elon Musk made the announcement in a tweet on Thursday.

title: Daniel Penny, man who choked subway rider, to face criminal charges: Sources
description: Jordan Neely, a homeless man, was killed by a fellow subway passenger named Daniel Penny.

title: Major, record-breaking heat wave moves into West Coast
description: Severe weather, including possible tornadoes and flash flooding, are expected in the Heartland Thursday, from the Plains to Texas to North Dakota.

title: Georgia's Fort Benning renamed Fort Moore
description: Georgia's Fort Benning renamed Fort Moore after Lt. General Harold G. Moore Jr. and his wife, Julia Moore.

title: FDA drops blood donation restrictions specific to gay, bisexual men
description: The Food and Drug Administration has dropped all restrictions specific to gay and bisexual men donating blood.

title: WATCH:  Alligator found in Florida stormwater pipe
description: While investigating a series of potholes, crews sent a robotic camera into the pipes beneath the road looking for issues beneath the surface — but found a five-foot-long alligator instead.

title: YouTuber who filmed his own plane crash to plead guilty to obstructing investigation
description: YouTuber Trevor Jacob has agreed to plead guilty to obstructing a federal investigation into a 2021 plane crash that the FAA claims the pilot purposely caused.

title: Woman who left note on grave of Putin's parents convicted amid dissent crackdown
description: A Russian court has given a two-year suspended sentence to a St_ Petersburg woman who left a note on the grave of President Vladimir Putin’s parents that said they had “raised a freak and a killer.”

title: Coast Guard suspends search for 3 people reported aboard downed plane off San Diego
description: Rescues crews have suspended their search for three people who were aboard a Learjet that plunged into the Pacific Ocean about a mile from a Navy-owned island off the coast of San Diego

title: How the EPA plans to regulate power plants going forward
description: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency is taking drastic measures to limit pollutants coming industries that cause the most environmental harm.

title: What is Title 8 immigration law?
description: As the last major Trump-era border restriction ends Thursday, officials will resume processing all migrants as they did before the pandemic.

title: WATCH:  Special education teacher runs half marathon with student in emotional video
description: Savanna Barton and her student, Sophie, who is non-verbal and needs assistance to walk, completed the 13.1 mile course in Pittsburgh.

title: WATCH:  Mexico's Popocatepetl volcano erupts twice
description: LIGHT UP THE NIGHT: Mexico's Popocatepetl volcano erupted twice in a row, sending lava high into the air. Local authorities cautioned residents to keep at a safe distance.

title: Mpox no longer a global emergency, WHO says
description: The World Health Organization says the global outbreak of mpox is no longer an international emergency

title: PacWest shares plummet after bank says it lost 9% of deposits last week
description: The sharp decline of PacWest stock prompted a pause in trading of its shares.

title: Peloton recalls more than 2 million bikes over fall hazard
description: Peloton is recalling over 2 million bikes, warning that the bike seat post assembly could break and cause users to fall.

title: US jobless claims filings highest since 2021, but job market remains healthy
description: The number of Americans filing for jobless claims last week rose to its highest level in four months, though the labor market remains healthy by historical standards

title: WATCH:  Cops respond to ‘very upset goat’ crying for help
description: Police officers in Oklahoma who rushed to the scene of a "person" crying for help discovered a "very upset goat" who had been separated from his friend, police said.

title: 13-year-old, police officer injured in gun battle outside Florida apartment complex
description: Officials say a 13-year-old exchanged gunfire with police during a chase through a central Florida neighborhood and was taken to the hospital with injuries not considered life-threatening

title: Woman struck by police motorcycle escorting UK royal
description: British police say a woman in her 80s is in critical condition after being hit by a police motorcycle that was escorting Prince Edward's wife Sophie

title: UK sending Ukraine long-range cruise missiles
description: British Defense Secretary Ben Wallace says the U.K. is sending Ukraine long-range cruise missiles to help push back Russian forces

title: Suspect in Natalee Holloway's disappearance faces extradition to US
description: Dutch citizen Joran van der Sloot is facing extradition from Peru to the United States over his alleged extortion of Natalee Holloway's family after her disappearance.

title: 9 railcars from Norfolk Southern train derail in Pennsylvania
description: Officials say nine railcars from a Norfolk Southern freight train derailed in Pennsylvania, with no hazardous chemicals on board and no reported injuries

title: WATCH:  Van explodes in central Milan, causing fire
description: Police say the cause of the blast is not yet clear.

title: Vehicle explodes in central Milan, releasing plumes of smoke
description: This is a developing story.

title: Shooting at Mercedes factory in Germany leaves 1 dead, 1 wounded
description: German authorities say a man opened fire at a Mercedes-Benz factory in southwestern Germany leaving two people dead

title: 'Armed and dangerous' man escapes Kentucky facility: Sheriff
description: Kentucky law enforcement is searching for an “armed and dangerous” man who escaped from a facility on Wednesday.

title: Under pressure, Homeland Security surging resources to border as Title 42 ends
description: The end of Title 42 test Homeland Security's mettle

title: Yellen: Different system needed to end repeated standoffs over US debt ceiling
description: Yellen sees a need to forestall repeated standoffs with Congress over spending.

title: Police find 'very upset goat' while responding to 'person' crying for help
description: Police officers in Oklahoma who rushed to the scene of a "person" crying for help discovered a "very upset goat" who had been separated from his friend, police said.

title: 5 injured in Denver shooting, with 1 in critical condition
description: Denver Police Department officials said they're investigating a shooting that left five people injured, including one critically.

title: Idaho triple murder trial of slain kids' mom drawing to end
description: Idaho prosecutors have spent the last four weeks presenting their case against a woman accused of killing her two youngest children and a romantic rival in a bizarre doomsday-focused plot

title: Ex-Kansas legislator who committed COVID relief fraud seeks to avoid prison sentence
description: A former Kansas lawmaker who was convicted of 12 felonies for lying on applications for federal COVID-19 relief is trying to avoid spending any time in prison

title: Suspect in Holloway case to be extradited to US
description: Peru’s government will allow the extradition to the United States of the prime suspect in the unsolved 2005 disappearance of American student Natalee Holloway on the Dutch Caribbean Island of Aruba, bringing her family hope there will be justice in the...

title: $24 million settlement announced after in-custody death of Edward Bronstein
description: Attorneys for the family of Edward Bronstein, who died in police custody in 2020, announced they reached a $24 million settlement with California.

title: Uber to launch flight booking feature on app in UK
description: The new feature powered by online travel agent Hopper will roll out for users in the United Kingdom this summer.
